info.name: WA Saphire Blue
info.description:
the original is https://userstyles.org/styles/116758/black-other-color-wa-wip

you get all the info there
info.additionalInfo:
this is a spinoff of the original, made in one of the early stages. The featured color is #00FFFF.
I'd advise you to use this hex color in the original Style to avoid this unfinished style.

If you like it buggy, here you have it. (This style is NOT SUPPORTED, means there will be no updates ever)
